ChallengeRemove duplicate elements
Submitter0x83d77abdd7a26ca...
Submitted at2018-31-12
Gas used994437
pragma solidity 0.4.24;


contract Unique {
   /**
    * @dev Removes all but the first occurrence of each element from a list of
    *      integers, preserving the order of original elements, and returns the list.
    *
    * The input list may be of any length.
    *
    * @param input The list of integers to uniquify.
    * @return The input list, with any duplicate elements removed.
    */

   function uniquify(uint[] input) public pure returns(uint[] ret) {
       if(input.length < 2) {
           return input;
       }

       uint lengthOfKeySpace = input.length*2;

       uint[] memory hashToNumber = new uint[](lengthOfKeySpace);
       uint[] memory index = new uint[](lengthOfKeySpace);
       uint counter = 0;
       bool nullValue;

       for(uint i = 0; i < input.length; i++) {
           uint hash = uint(sha3(input[i]))%lengthOfKeySpace;

           while(hashToNumber[hash]!=0 && hashToNumber[hash]!=input[i]) {
               hash=(hash+1)%lengthOfKeySpace;
           }


           if(hashToNumber[hash]==0 && input[i] != 0) {
               hashToNumber[hash] = input[i];
               index[counter] = input[i];
               counter++;
           }
           else if(!nullValue && input[i] == 0){
               nullValue = true;
               hashToNumber[hash] = 0;
               index[counter] = 0;
               counter++;
           }
       }

       ret = new uint[](counter);
       for(i=0; i < counter; i++) {
           ret[i] = index[i];
       }
   }
}
